The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law is going to go a long way to help improve Arizona's resiliency to drought‚Äîbut federal leaders and our state partners have to continue to be proactive to secure our water future.
https://t.co/WqpfbandP9

There‚Äôs still a lot more work to do to realize our shared vision.

Proud to join @SecDebHaaland and Gov. @stephenroelewis to announce that $1.7 billion from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law will go to fulfill the terms of Tribal water settlements‚Äîensuring Tribes like @GRIC_Official have the resources they need to improve their water systems. https://t.co/Mt2ZcCAoZH

Putin‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine must be met with swift and severe consequences‚Äîhis continued aggression aimed at upending the post-Cold War order in Europe cannot stand. 

I expect the Biden Administration to impose punishing sanctions tomorrow, and it will have my full support.

Good to be in Tempe this afternoon to help kick off the annual @auntritas AIDS walk.

I‚Äôll keep working in Congress to secure more resources for preventative care and treatment. Together we can end HIV and AIDS for the next generation. https://t.co/9j5XxHpoMx

The current policy that bans gay and bisexual men from donating blood cannot be justified with science. 

As Arizona and the nation face a critical blood shortage, I‚Äôm calling on the FDA to allow all healthy Americans to answer the call to help. https://t.co/32b9iJNZpX

Great to attend @chandlerazmayor‚Äôs State of the City!

I'm urging the @US_FDA to immediately end this unnecessary and discriminatory ban. https://t.co/gzMAkEqxm6

Today, I'll vote for the Postal Service Reform Act to strengthen USPS and ensure it functions efficiently. https://t.co/uQuyzRPSGD

@HouseJudiciary Last night, the House passed the Ending Forced Arbitration of Sexual Assault & Sexual Harassment Act, which would allow survivors to elect to file a case in a court of law rather than be subject to mandatory, pre-dispute arbitration.

Forced arbitration clauses protect abusers and deny sexual assault and harassment survivors their day in court.

On @HouseJudiciary, I was proud to advance legislation to #EndForcedArbitration‚Äîand I'm grateful to the brave survivors for helping expose this predatory practice. https://t.co/tDbZDrJhzO

Mesa‚Äôs Asian District is a point of pride for the East Valley. Great to join @MayorGiles, @chandlerazmayor, @mayorcoreywoods and community partners at the Asian Festival this morning to unveil the new Asian District signs at the Sycamore/Main St. Light Rail station. https://t.co/ywp8PghOi2

The America COMPETES Act will invest $52 billion in domestic semiconductor production‚Äîa huge boost for our regional economy. https://t.co/9GRVPO2VL2

After the 2008 financial crisis, it took nearly 10 years for jobs to recover to pre-crash levels.

Thanks to our efforts to crush this virus and rebuild our economy, Americans are getting back to work at a record-setting pace. https://t.co/dNdau3HSTE

We have to get serious about the risk that Chinese government-backed companies pose to our economic competitiveness and national security.

My bipartisan amendment to the COMPETES Act levels the playing field for American businesses and protects consumers. https://t.co/YVofOwnorO

Thanks to the skill and courage of our special forces, the global leader of ISIS was killed in this morning's successful counterterrorism raid.

America, and the world, are safer for it. https://t.co/gUlP1Xx6s3

 https://t.co/8dOFbgtWom

#NeverAgain is a call to action. Each and every one of us has a responsibility to stand up to antisemitism and bigotry wherever we encounter it. #HolocaustRemembranceDay

2021 was one of the deadliest years on Arizona roads in decades. We need bold action to make our streets safer for all users.

Arizonans should feel confident that their elected leaders are working for them‚Äînot padding their own pocketbooks.

I joined my colleagues in calling on Speaker Pelosi to hold a vote on bills that ban lawmakers from trading individual stocks. https://t.co/RuzQjqy0iD
Wonderful news! Continuing to pray for Officer Moldovan and his loved ones‚Äîa grateful city is with them on the road to recovery. https://t.co/ORfcfYxdYl

https://t.co/u24YyQwRF4

Members of Congress should be committed to serving their constituents, not their own financial interests. 

That's why I'm proud to cosponsor the bipartisan TRUST in Congress Act to ban lawmakers from buying or selling individual stocks while in office. https://t.co/JQIMDoyxAg

Through no fault of their own, too many families across Arizona have been hit with unexpected and very expensive surprise medical bills.

A powerful morning as we marched again in downtown Phoenix to honor Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

Dr. King fought for voting rights as a necessary condition for equal opportunity and justice. We must continue to ‚Äúmake real the promises of democracy‚Äù that he spoke of. https://t.co/0Z9zhcdUY5

There are many who praise Dr. King with words, but stand in the way of the America he envisioned with their deeds. 

The best way this Congress can honor Dr. King‚Äôs legacy is by passing legislation to protect and defend the sacred right to vote for all Americans. #MLKDay

Arizona has more than 130 bridges in desperate need of repair‚Äîthat means longer commute times & more wear and tear on your car. 

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law invests more than $225 million over the next five years to fix Arizona bridges, creating thousands of good jobs. https://t.co/lG1MIPxU8I

The filibuster is harmful to our democracy, and it hurts Arizona.

Arizonans deserve the protections included in the Freedom to Vote: John R. Lewis Act. They deserve a stronger democracy.
The Senate‚Äôs filibuster rule is enabling a purely partisan block of one of the most important civil rights and pro-democracy bills of our time: The Freedom to Vote: John R. Lewis Act.

Our nation‚Äôs experiment in democracy can only continue to work if the fundamental right to vote is secure. America is in the midst of a defining moment. Our democracy‚Äîand the legitimacy of our free and fair elections‚Äîare under attack.

Today we hit a grim milestone‚Äî25,000 Arizonans have died from COVID. My heart is with every family who is mourning a loved one lost to this terrible virus.

Health care workers are fighting day and night to save lives. Do your part. Get vaccinated/boosted: https://t.co/v86JivqEwa https://t.co/ieZ1fuyba4

The GI Bill has allowed millions of veterans to pursue higher education. But despite serving in times of need, including throughput the pandemic, @AZNationalGuard and Reserve Members don‚Äôt have access to the GI Bill benefits they've earned.

Today I voted to change that. https://t.co/7P6YOK69pI

In Arizona, air conditioning isn't just an amenity, it's a necessity. The #AmericanRescuePlan more than doubled funding for LIHEAP‚Äîthe Low Income Housing Energy Assistance Program‚Äîto ensure families and seniors struggling to pay their utility bills get the support they need. https://t.co/pYeGsuXS6U

This week, the CDC and FDA authorized and recommended booster shots for kids ages 12 to 15. This is welcome news in our efforts to keep students in school and teachers and staff safe.

Learn more about getting you and your child a booster shot ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/v86JivqEwa

One year ago, just a few hours after the Capitol was attacked in a deadly attempt to prevent the peaceful transfer of power, I took to the House Floor to remind my colleagues that defending democracy is not‚Äîand should not be‚Äîa partisan task. https://t.co/eslPY8RfWm

We are in the midst of the most perilous times in the history of our fragile democracy. But we are not powerless to stop it. 

The House has passed critical voting rights legislation to protect every American's access to the ballot box‚Äîit is up to the Senate to meet this moment.

The Big Lie has been used as pretext all over the country‚Äîincluding Arizona‚Äîfor efforts to restrict access to the ballot, install elected officials willing to openly ignore the legal votes of the people, and to adopt ways to overturn the results of future elections.

That day, the domestic terrorists failed. 

But it was the beginning of the Big Lie and a dangerous plot to overturn future elections. The fraudulent conspiracy that the election was anything but safe, secure and fair has infected politics at every level.

I‚Äôll never forget the sacrifices that @CapitolPolice and @DCPoliceDept officers made that day. More than 100 officers were injured, and five tragically lost their lives in the days and weeks that followed.
One year ago, a violent mob of domestic terrorists stormed the Capitol with a single goal: overturn a free and fair election‚Äîthe bedrock of our democracy.
Happy first day of #Kwanzaa! As you light the candles each night, may the seven guiding principles restore and inspire you and your loved ones.
Merry Christmas from my family to yours! Wishing you a peaceful and safe holiday.üéÑ https://t.co/5GpVgd3D3n

Congratulations to all the @ASU graduates walking today! You make our state proud. https://t.co/8fk7LqFc2X

Expanding passenger rail between Phoenix and Tucson will strengthen our economy and reduce congestion + emissions along the I-10.
